verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:1
verses.text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved, we have a building of God, an house not made with hands, eternal in the heavens.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:2
verses.text: For in this we groan, earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven:

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:3
verses.text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:4
verses.text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan, being burdened: not for that we would be unclothed, but clothed upon, that mortality might be swallowed up of life.
